data.name: Cosmo
data.description: A once ordinary dog that gained powers from cosmic rays and became an animal astronaut, Cosmo proves herself to be a Commander's best friend by clearing enemy buffs and ally debuffs.

starItems.name: Cosmo
starItems.description: A once ordinary dog that gained powers from cosmic rays and became an animal astronaut, Cosmo proves herself to be a Commander's best friend by clearing enemy buffs and ally debuffs.

1.nextUpgrade:
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target

2.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from primary target

3.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to revive a dead Korg ally with <color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health

4.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to revive a Korg ally with <color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.

5.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to revive a Korg ally with <color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, always revive a dead Korg ally with <color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health

6.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>290%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to revive a dead Korg ally with <color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health. In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, always revive a dead Korg ally with <color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.
6.nextUpgrade:
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self
+<color=#86e619>70%</color> damage to primary target
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from primary target

7.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>360%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to revive a dead Korg ally with <color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health. In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, always revive a dead Korg ally with <color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.

1.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> from self and all allies.

Heal the most injured ally for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
 > This attack is Unavoidable.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects.

Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> from self and all allies.

Heal the most injured ally for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
 > This attack is Unavoidable.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> from self and all allies
Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to self and all <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies

3.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects.

Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> from self and all allies.

Heal the most injured ally for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to self and all <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
 > This attack is Unavoidable.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects from self and all allies

4.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects.

Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> and <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects from self and all allies.

Heal the most injured ally for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to self and all <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
 > This attack is Unavoidable.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects from primary and secondary targets

5.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects.

Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> and <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects from self and all allies.

Heal the most injured ally for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to self and all <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
 > This attack is Unavoidable.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Healing

6.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>320%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects.

Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> and <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects from self and all allies.

Heal the most injured ally for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to self and all <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
 > This attack is Unavoidable.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>80%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Clear all positive effects from primary and secondary targets

7.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage + clear all positive effects.

Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> and <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects from self and all allies.

Heal the most injured ally for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to self and all <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
 > This attack is Unavoidable.

1.description:
Fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> + <color=#86e619>5%</color> per <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> ally.

Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects from self and all allies.
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects from all enemies.

Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

2.description:
Fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> + <color=#86e619>5%</color> per <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> ally.

Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects from self and all allies.
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects from all enemies.

Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.
2.nextUpgrade:
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> random negative effects from self and all allies
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> random positive effects from all enemies

3.description:
Fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> + <color=#86e619>5%</color> per <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> ally.

Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> random negative effects from self and all allies.
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> random positive effects from all enemies.

Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.
3.nextUpgrade: Barrier self and all allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health

4.description:
Fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> + <color=#86e619>5%</color> per <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> ally.

Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> random negative effects from self and all allies.
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> random positive effects from all enemies.

Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Barrier self and all allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

5.description:
Fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> + <color=#86e619>5%</color> per <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> ally.

Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> random negative effects from self and all allies.
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> random positive effects from all enemies.

Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Barrier self and all allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
5.nextUpgrade:
Clear all negative effects from self and all allies
Clear all positive effects from all enemies

6.description:
Fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> + <color=#86e619>5%</color> per <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> ally.

Clear all negative effects from self and all allies.
Clear all positive effects from all enemies.

Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Barrier self and all allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
6.nextUpgrade: In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies + generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self and all <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies

7.description:
Fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> + <color=#86e619>5%</color> per <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> ally.

Clear all negative effects from self and all allies.
Clear all positive effects from all enemies.

Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Barrier self and all allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies.
 > Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self and all <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies.

1.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Resistance.
1.nextUpgrade: While this character has <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> or <color=#fff568>Minor Deflect</color>, lower the Crit Chance of all enemies by <color=#86e619>25%</color>

2.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.

While this character has <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> or <color=#fff568>Minor Deflect</color>, lower the Crit Chance of all enemies by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Resistance.
2.nextUpgrade: When an enemy attacks this character, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to that character + in <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, deal damage equal to <color=#86e619>5%</color> of that character's Max Health

3.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.

When an enemy attacks this character, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to that character + in <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, deal damage equal to <color=#86e619>5%</color> of that character's Max Health.

While this character has <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> or <color=#fff568>Minor Deflect</color>, lower the Crit Chance of all enemies by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Resistance.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Resistance for self and all <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Resistance for self and all <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies

4.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.

When an enemy attacks this character, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to that character + in <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, deal damage equal to <color=#86e619>5%</color> of that character's Max Health.

While this character has <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> or <color=#fff568>Minor Deflect</color>, lower the Crit Chance of all enemies by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Resistance.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Resistance for self and all <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies.
4.nextUpgrade:
When an enemy attacks this character, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
While this character has <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> or <color=#fff568>Minor Deflect</color>, lower the Crit Chance for all enemies by <color=#86e619>50%</color>

5.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.

When an enemy attacks this character, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to that character + in <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, deal damage equal to <color=#86e619>5%</color> of that character's Max Health.

While this character has <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> or <color=#fff568>Minor Deflect</color>, lower the Crit Chance of all enemies by <color=#86e619>50%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Resistance.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Resistance for self and all <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies.
